 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָעָה‎</span>] **verb** ==stoop, bend, incline== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">) ***incline, lean***, compare also <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — 

**Qal** ***Participle*** 

**1.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צֹעֶה‎</span> [[Isa.51.14|Isa 51:14]] ***one stooping*** (under a burden), [[Isa.63.1|Isa 63:1]] ***bending*** (forward or backward; from abundant strength), but read probably <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צֹעֵד‎</span> ***marching*** ([[BDB#Lo|Lo]] [[BDB#Gr|Gr]] [[BDB#Che|Che]] [[BDB#Du|Du]] [[BDB#Di|Di-Kit]] and others); feminine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַתְּ צֹעָה זֹּנָה‎</span> [[Jer.2.20|Jer 2:20]] (in sensu obscoeno). 

**2.** transitive (= **Pi\`el** q. v.) plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צֹעִים‎</span> [[Jer.48.12|Jer 48:12]] ***men inclining, tipping*** a vessel, to empty it. **Pi\`el** ***Perfect*** 3 plural suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְצֵעֻהוּ‎</span> [[Jer.48.12|Jer 48:12]] I will send tippers ***and they shall tip him over*** (Moab, under figure of vessel).
